titleStmt.title: By the King. The Kings most excellent Maiestie, finding that the infection of the plague is at this present dispersed and scattered ...
Proclamations. 1630-09-09
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Wansted, the ninth day of September, 1630 ... .
Arms 21; Steele notation: Infection dome 2) either 3) And contemning.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.
